betOffers.extra: Winner decided by who reaches the required number of Electoral Votes on Election day

criterion.label: Party to obtain an overall majority of seats in the Senate
criterion.englishLabel: Party to obtain an overall majority of seats in the Senate

betOffers.extra: Party affiliation of election candidates shall refer to a U.S. Senate candidate’s ballot-listed or otherwise readily identifiable party preference on the day of the election. Should there be no such preference, a candidate shall be considered to be affiliated with a party if prior to the election he or she has stated an intention to caucus with a particular party.
